body_html:
It's not clear that those messages indeed indicate the problem, cc @zheng-xq just in case. Note that each K80 card consists of two gk110 GPUs, and most things in TF don't automatically parallelize over multiple GPUs.

In terms of SGEMM FLOPS, gk110 peaks at about 3 TFLOPS whereas GTX Pascal TitanX is about 11 TFLOPS, which means there are situations where your Dual K80 setup is expected to run 4x slower than your single TitanX.

body:
It's not clear that those messages indeed indicate the problem, cc @zheng-xq  just in case. Note that each K80 card consists of two gk110 GPUs, and most things in TF don't automatically parallelize over multiple GPUs.

In terms of SGEMM FLOPS, gk110 peaks at about 3 TFLOPS whereas GTX Pascal TitanX is about 11 TFLOPS, which means there are situations where your Dual K80 setup is expected to run 4x slower than your single TitanX.
